statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, vr_experience_preference, theme_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_preference = 'dark';
SELECT user_id, control_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT theme_preference, control_settings, vr_experience_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_experience_preference = 'immersive';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_experience_preference = 'preferred';
SELECT user_id, theme_preference, control_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY theme_preference DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference, control_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_preference = 'dark' AND vr_experience_preference = 'preferred' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, vr_experience_preference, control_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE control_settings->>'mouse_speed' > '5' ORDER BY control_settings->>'mouse_speed' ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, vr_experience_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT username, user_id, vr_experience_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, vr_experience_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_preferences WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, vr_experience_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(vr_experience_preferences, '$.sound') = 'on';
SELECT user_id, language, theme FROM user_settings WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT user_id, controller_settings FROM user_settings WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(controller_settings, '$.sensitivity') > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, display_settings FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT activity_name, duration_minutes, activity_type FROM VRActivities ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT user_id, activities_completed FROM UserStatistics WHERE activities_completed > 10;
SELECT user_id, favorite_activities FROM UserStatistics WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, display_settings, audio_settings FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, duration_minutes, activity_type FROM VRActivities WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, activities_completed FROM UserStatistics WHERE activities_completed >= 10 AND user_id <> '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences INNER JOIN VRActivities ON UserPreferences.user_id = VRActivities.user_id WHERE VRActivities.activity_type = 'sport' ORDER BY UserPreferences.user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM UserStatistics WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_timezone FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, vr_experience FROM VRPreferences ORDER BY vr_experience DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, font_size FROM UserSettings WHERE theme_color = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM VRSettings WHERE resolution = '1080p' AND quality > 60;
SELECT user_id, preferred_timezone, preferred_language FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, vr_experience, display_settings FROM VRPreferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM UserSettings WHERE theme_color = 'blue' ORDER BY font_size DESC;
SELECT vr_experience, resolution, quality FROM VRSettings WHERE resolution = '1080p' AND quality > 80;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, font_size FROM UserSettings WHERE font_size BETWEEN 12 AND 16 ORDER BY theme_color ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM DeviceSettings WHERE volume > 50;
SELECT device_id, brightness FROM DeviceSettings WHERE brightness < 50 ORDER BY brightness DESC;
SELECT resolution, fov FROM DeviceFeatures WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE language='English';
SELECT id, theme FROM ThemeSettings WHERE primary_color='Blue' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, brightness, volume FROM DeviceSettings WHERE user_id=2 AND brightness > 50;
SELECT user_id, experience_id, rating FROM ExperiencePreferences WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
